alert.note: Alert for Santa Clarita Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 02 at 8:22PM PDT until April 03 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM PDT MONDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM MONDAY TO 5 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northwest to north winds 25 to 40 mph with damaging gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 6 PM Monday to 5 AM PDT Tuesday. For the Wind Advisory, from 6 AM to 6 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
